content: That's a great list, thanks! I'm particularly interested in "Moonlight" and "The Florida Project", as they both seem to explore similar themes of identity and social justice. Can you tell me more about the cinematography in these films? I've been taking a cinematography workshop online and I'd love to learn more about the camera techniques used in these films. By the way, attending the Q&A session with Todd Phillips and Joaquin Phoenix at AFI Fest was amazing - they shared some fascinating insights into their creative process and the film's bold portrayal of mental health and societal decay.
